DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective study evaluate diagnostic capability keratoconus match index ( KMI ) keratoconus match probability ( KMP ) index forme fruste keratoconus ( FFK ) , association series Pentacam-derived keratconus ( KC ) index . KMI KMP parameter KC-specifc index measure Ocular Response Analyzer ( ORA ) , base distinct ORA-derived waveform characteristic KC eye . Study participant recruit Cornea Outpatient service consecutive eligible basis . Two study group form : ) FFK group ( FFKG ) include patient diagnose FFK , , b ) Control group ( CG ) form refractive surgery candidate . All ORA ( Reichert Ophthalmic Instrument , Buffalo , NY , USA , software version : 3.01 ) Pentacam ( Pentacam HR , Oculus Optikgerate GmbH , Heidelberg , Germany ) measurement perform experienced operator consistent way
DOC.brief_title: Diagnostic Capacity Keratoconus Match Index Keratoconus Match Probability Forme Fruste Keratoconus
